issue.title: tableFromIPC should handle AsyncRecordBatchReader inputs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16704](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16704). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
To match the prior `Table.from()` method, `tableFromIPC()` method should handle the case where the input is an async RecordBatchReader.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16704?focusedCommentId=17545088) by Dominik Moritz (domoritz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13278
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13278>
